website_summaries.verdict: A tough cover with wind straps for a good price.
pros: Three layers of polypropylene with UV and water proof protection make this a tough cover for any weather
When fitted properly, this cover prevents damage from the elements
cons: Cover may scratch car if not removed gently

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality cover
customer_reviews.text: I think this cover is made of paper. I immediately could tell it was poor quality, but figured I would give it a chance. Put it on my car, fit ok, I just took off the cover a month later and it ripped in several spots. I wrote the company first with a private message, but never heard back. So, here’s the review for everyone to see. Jeremy
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Lieb

customer_reviews.title: stiff
customer_reviews.text: I have had this long enough now to give it a rating and I can't highly recommend it as a couple of the ties have come off as though they weren't sewn very well at all. It's made of a very stiff material so it's rather difficult to put on and take off if you're using it very much. If you want to store a car I suppose it would be much more usable because the ties wouldn't be used a lot and it would just sit there.
customer_reviews.author: S L M

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, and not soft on the inside.
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked it, and it is a lot thinner than expected. Inside layer is not soft and looks like it will scratch, as it is not much different than the outside layer. Thin cheap Velcro straps on each end which seem to be located in the wrong place to do much good. There is a strap in the middle, which you have to install the only buckle provided. Can't seem to tighten it or snug it, as it keeps pulling out. ( Could be just me) No lock or cable provided. Will give an update after rain or wind.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Klein

customer_reviews.title: BULLET PROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover has far exceeded my expectations regardless of the price! It's just a bonus that the price is very reasonable. I waited to post a review because I wanted to see how it did through the winter so my review would matter. We've had 2 ice storms, 12" of snow & several inches of rain since December when I purchased it. It weathered all the storm without resulting in a signs flaw in my paint. I ordered the cover 6" larger than my measurement of my 66 Dart after reading the reviews. It was a perfect, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Renee W

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is a quality product. It is not as thick as other products which costs 2 to 3 times more. I ordered one size larger than what was recommended for my car. It was a good decision since the elastic bottoms are further under the car and will withstand higher winds. Will report after 6 months of use and comment on water proof and sun damage qualities.
customer_reviews.author: zatoichi

customer_reviews.title: Old Leader durability gone
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 4 or 5 Leader car covers in the past for different cars. First cover withstood Florida sun for 2-3 years for 49.99 was a decent value. Latest Leader purchases last under 1 year before turning to dust. Look else where for a durable car cover , Amazon/Leader have traded high profits for garbage materials
customer_reviews.author: Kirt

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first one based on durability and went with this one. It’s better, but not much tougher then the bargain one from them. UPDATE-7/2020 and this one is holding up very well. Still looks new. Survived the Pacific NW winter weather and the early Summer. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: RANDY J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Crown Victoria Perfectly. I just need to replace the Secure cover holders. Thanks to the person who answered my question about what size i should buy. Much appreciated! And once again thanks Amazon, for having this product from Leader Accessories!
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Car cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits great but the straps rip easily and the rain does go through and so does the dust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally disintegrated in less than nine months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for an un-licensed vehicle maintained in the driveway. Description indicates good for outdoor use, but it didn’t even last one year before it began falling apart. This is the second one (and supposedly better quality) which didn’t even last as long as the lesser model. Very disappointed and not buy from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: D. CARTER

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CAR COVER FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Water Proof as far as I can see. Fits Perfect. Heavy duty. Not the usual paper thin cloth that crumbles after 6 months in a Florida Sun. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. WILDS

customer_reviews.title: Undercover bargain
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it would be, fits just right stands up to the wind and rain well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As tight as the fit was, debris still managed to get underneath....smh
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the size of vehicle it says it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Despite saying it would fit sedans up to 228" inches long neither one of the two that were sent to me came even close to fitting my 216" sedan. I expected it to fit with some room to spare (somewhere in the 12" of room to spare range), but I couldn't get it even close to the corners. I'll find a different one that will hopefully measure up...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Daly

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and sheds water and grim better than any other cover.
customer_reviews.text: Used to cover my 62 Studebaker. Excellent product, did exactly what I expected it to do. Its water shedding ability exceeds other covers including the Rain X one that I thought was pretty good. If you're looking for a car cover this is the one you should get.
customer_reviews.author: Don Brennan

customer_reviews.title: It last a year only
customer_reviews.text: It is too expensive to last only one year it disintegrated and torn apart. Washington weather.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really protects my Malibu!! Very durable. Easy to take off/put on.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Specs were not correct - too short to fit my car/ 1974 AMC Ambassador sedan.
customer_reviews.text: I finally went to put it on today, it looks strong and had nice attaching parts but it did not fit. it was too short for my vehicle even thought the product specs said it would fit. Was at least 1 foot too short. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: yibari

customer_reviews.title: Fits but leaves part of the car and tires exposed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my 1965 Bel Air. Car measures 213" bumper to bumper. Cover fits but leaves front bumper exposed and lower rear quarter panels exposed. The cover is well made and so far has kept the car dry so for that I'm happy but I wish this cover was just a little bigger. If your car is over 17' then I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: cooney`

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, keep my car clean, doesn't even get weed went rain. Really recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Morrobel

customer_reviews.title: I've tried 3 covers before this one, THIS is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 3 covers before this one, THIS is the one...make sure you order the size for your vehicle
customer_reviews.author: sonja medford

customer_reviews.title: Good material, seems heavy duty to protect my 2000 ...
customer_reviews.text: Good material, seems heavy duty to protect my 2000 Cadillac Seville. I think it could use another strap..it has blown off one end once so far.Waiting for a good windy day and a rainy day to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, fits...like most of my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a car cover that will cover my 1976 Caddy - the world's largest car. I'm not picky. I need a cover to ....cover my car, keep out dust and hopefully repel water. This one works for me and my convertible.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hell

customer_reviews.title: Great material.
customer_reviews.text: Should have got next size, but fits snug. Great material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable plenty of room for a big car
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Never get water or snow in side my car Best
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Car cover
customer_reviews.text: I like the tie down strap for windy days, other than that it's just a basic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like very good protection against dust birds and sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cover is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great for the price. It doesn't have a custom fit but is plenty big and has a good elastic bottom to keep it in place. I store my car inside so it is mostly a dust cover. Seems sturdy and soft. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this cover add said it was 228” my car is 225” and the cover didn’t fit
customer_reviews.author: Eddie H.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: good quality and easy to use. I recommend buying a bungee cord and clip system to keep the wind from tearing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Joerger

customer_reviews.title: Is it made of rice paper
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 5 layer car cover Completely Disintegrated in six months
customer_reviews.author: Allen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 225” car and the cover for up to 228” doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this, my car is in garage
customer_reviews.text: Love this, my car is in garage, so it's thick enough for me. Fits my '05 Grand Prix great! Was able to put it on myself!
customer_reviews.author: Brizzbane

customer_reviews.title: happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 months and it has done a great job would reccommend this product. please measure so that you wont have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: too short for my car 1989 cat would not clover ...
customer_reviews.text: too short for my car 1989 cat would not clover all of my car this car is shorter 19'0'' I need a longer clover need Amazon to send me a longer clover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product brought for mother in laws Chevy super sport highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jerrome

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can't get this cover to stay on the car. A light wind blows it off.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Marc

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last at all but contacted customer service and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last at all but contacted customer service and they sent a replacement immediately. 5 stars on customer service but 1 star for product durability.
customer_reviews.author: ehenderson

customer_reviews.title: great for the price so far
customer_reviews.text: great for the price so far, been on my car outdoors for 4 - 5 months in florida and still holding up well
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great fit on XLR. great quality works well for under carport
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car cover.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover for Cadillac. Keeps it very protected from weather elements.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kinkade "Juan"

customer_reviews.title: Leader Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits the car I ordered for. Stays on with winds. Protects the car when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: K. faust

customer_reviews.title: Winter weather covered in northern Nv.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 Xlarge Leader covers for my classic 71 Camaro SS and my 09 Shelby GT 500. They fit PERFECT, and the quality of the material is great for the price. You won't find a better product for the money. Kudos to the Leader Company.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: This was supposed to fit a car up to 228" ...
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to fit a car up to 228" and my car is 221". The cover is not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cover works great, bag not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The actual cover works great but a bit difficult to put on by yourself, bag is a little to small to use easily and ripped. Despite this, I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Carts

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting cover; good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It was nice to be able to choose a length appropriate for the vehicle. We purchased this in two sizes, but we didn't have to use the 170" top as we sold that vehicle. The 200" cover fit perfectly on the 64 SS Impala convertible, and that vehicle is inside. Wouldn't be able to give advice on how these covers stand up to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so It would keep dust off my car when in the garage, problem is the protection was dustier than my garage could ever be. When I pulled it off my car there was a thick layer of dust from the cloth. It needs to be washed prior to sending it out, I'd wash it myself but the thing is huge. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away after 3 months. Completely false description ...
customer_reviews.text: Threw it away after 3 months. Completely false description...washed my car put the cover over it and it had a pile of dust when I took the cover off...what does dust do when you pull a cover off? Yep, it scratches the paint. Not worth 1 dollar let alone what I paid for it. Had I known I would have spent more for a cover that actually kept the elements out. This is one cover you do not want, unless it's​ safely covered in a garage.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: David L Berger

customer_reviews.title: I like it, the only thing is kind of light ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the only thing is kind of light so its a little hard to put it on if is windy, but other than that is really good. I am happy with the merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: feels like quality to me
customer_reviews.text: very nice cover. is thicker than the store bought ones i have purchased multiple times that have worn out. feels like quality to me. also comes with a clip that goes under the middle of the car to secure cover. also has a strechy seem at bottom fits pretty snugly. Used on a 72 chevelle.
customer_reviews.author: Skilz

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, well made, everything I wanted for a good price. The way it's designed makes it easy to figure out exactly how it goes on. I have seen them that were hard to see which way to turn it.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: I would have been very happy had it fit my car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my 72 Ranchero which is 216 inches long. Although it was stated this cover fits cars up to 228 inches, it did not fully cover my Ranchero. The car cover itself was made very well. It was package well. It had the antenna kit included, with instructions. I would have been very happy had it fit my car.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cover my old Cadillac in the driveway, keeps it dry and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: made well but about 2" longer and it would fit right
customer_reviews.author: james hespell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, delivered in s timely manner.. Will order again..
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Guidry

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: It fits my '71 Chevelle Malibu sedan. We'll see how long it lasts. Update July 2015: The cover did not last a year and ruined the paint on my car. I recently removed the cover and noticed it seemed to crumble in my hand. After I laid it on the ground I noticed there were several spots that were now a see-through mesh offering no protection. Also, there was a gray film of dust left on the car and several spots were the paint as lightened like someone dribbled paint thinner on the paint. I am not happy and do not recommend this cover, especially not for a classic car.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality ripped the first time I put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality ripped the first time I put it on the car very thin I don't know where the 5 layers come from do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is nice, doesn't scratch
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I'd hoped, but that's probably because my car is bigger than I thought ('65 Pontiac Catalina). It covers the top but is too tight to get past the bottom of the bumpers. The fabric is nice, doesn't scratch, but it's not really waterproof. It will withstand water for awhile, but I guess it's no match for the rain of the Pacific Northwest. The water now wicks through the fabric, and it's been on my car for around 2 months. It rains a lot here, so I'm not that surprised. Would probably be OK in other areas with less rain. Guess I'm looking for a tarp now!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: WORST CAR COVER AND WORST WARRANTY SERVICE EVER.
customer_reviews.text: WORST CAR COVER I've purchased. Lasted less than 11 months. Top layer of cover is flaking off. DON'T purchase if you live in a sunny area. Customer service was absolutely non responsive. I sent them a warranty claim, and received NO RESPONSE. AMAZON DID NOT HELP with the Warranty Claim whatsoever. The cover looked nice for the first 8 months, but after spending the big bucks on this, the flaking of the top layer started.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: It is not at all what I expected. It is just a big bag...the instructions call for starting at the spot marked "front"...there is no such place. The bag would cover a small SUV...I wanted a neat cover for my 2004 Porsche Boxster (as advertised). Instead, I have this big, baggy ill fitting piece of cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not the size it states. For a very small car
customer_reviews.text: Stated on site it would fit my car type. That is not true to small.
customer_reviews.author: friendly 1

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was great under 3 weeks later when it torn open
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was great under 3 weeks later when it torn open. Apparently it is not tough as described. This is an an indoor use only cover if you want it to last. I made the wrong choice and wasted $50 on my cover, Do your homework and pay a bit more for a real outdoor cover. You can see in my pics that there is no pull or strain on the material as I bought a longer length. I don't understand how this cover got so many decent reviews if it can't last over 3 weeks without falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: RPriz

customer_reviews.title: Many tears after only 3 uses. Did not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Many tears after only 3 uses. Did not fit my car as claimed. Is to small. Don't waist your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: gloria kidder

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have had limited opportunity to really test that waterproofing or sun resistance. Covers has been the very good fit that covers not just the bumpers but also the hubcaps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Beck

product_meta.title: Leader Accessories Xtreme guard 5 Layers Waterproof Breathable Outdoor Indoor Car Cover (Cars up to 19'0"(228"))

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars122 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
